title: Friday night lights across the valley — PHOTOS
text:
Friday night lights across the valley — PHOTOS Friday night lights across the valley — PHOTOS 
Las Vegas‘ Elijah Hicks (10) runs the ball up the field during their prep football game against Canyon Springs High School at Las Vegas High School on Friday, Oct. 16, 2015. Daniel Clark/Las Vegas Review-Journal Friday night lights across the valley — PHOTOS 
Canyon Springs‘ Devin Allen-Tucker (12) breaks a tackle and runs the ball in for a touchdown during their prep football game at Las Vegas High School on Friday, Oct. 16, 2015. Daniel Clark/Las Vegas Review-Journal Friday night lights across the valley — PHOTOS 
Canyon Springs‘ Anthony Hicks (36) tackles Las Vegas‘ Elijah Hicks (10) during their prep football game at Las Vegas High School on Friday, Oct. 16, 2015. Daniel Clark/Las Vegas Review-Journal Friday night lights across the valley — PHOTOS 
Canyon Springs‘ Diamante Burton (10) tries to elude tackers during their prep football game at Las Vegas High School on Friday, Oct. 16, 2015. Daniel Clark/Las Vegas Review-Journal Friday night lights across the valley — PHOTOS 
Canyon Springs‘ Diamante Burton (10) attempts to run the ball up the field during their prep football game at Las Vegas High School on Friday, Oct. 16, 2015. Daniel Clark/Las Vegas Review-Journal Friday night lights across the valley — PHOTOS 
Canyon Springs‘ Diamante Burton (10) is tackled by Thomas Dorsey (15) during their prep football game at Las Vegas High School on Friday, Oct. 16, 2015. Daniel Clark/Las Vegas Review-Journal Friday night lights across the valley — PHOTOS 
Las Vegas‘ Elijah Hicks (10) runs the ball up the field during their prep football game against Canyon Springs High School at Las Vegas High School on Friday, Oct. 16, 2015. Daniel Clark/Las Vegas Review-Journal Friday night lights across the valley — PHOTOS 
Las Vegas‘ Raul Perez (7) runs the ball up the field during their prep football game against Canyon Springs High School at Las Vegas High School on Friday, Oct. 16, 2015. Daniel Clark/Las Vegas Review-Journal Friday night lights across the valley — PHOTOS 
Las Vegas‘ Elijah Hicks (10) dives for a touchdown during their prep football game against Canyon Springs High School at Las Vegas High School on Friday, Oct. 16, 2015. Daniel Clark/Las Vegas Review-Journal Friday night lights across the valley — PHOTOS 
Canyon Springs‘ Jaleel Rogers (23) breaks a tackle during their prep football game at Las Vegas High School on Friday, Oct. 16, 2015. Daniel Clark/Las Vegas Review-Journal Complete coverage of high school sports. reviewjournal.com 
It's Friday night, and - despite the weather - that still means it's time for high school football across the Las Vegas Valley. 
Visit NevadaPreps.com for the latest scores and reports.
